features: Friendly, minimalist design fits in at home and the office
Base shape keeps the pouch standing upright when full
Internal slip pockets flex to fit all shapes and sizes
Expandable storage grows as you fill it
Packs flat when empty, taking up less room in a travel bag
Wide mouth opening lets you easily see what’s inside
Soft grab loop allows for one-finger carry
Made with fabric woven from sustainably harvested wood pulp and upcycled cotton offcuts
Branding accent made from Mirum®, a 100% biodegradable plant-based material
